ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE W. PAUL RILEY, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, to be a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia; and a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Yukon during her tenure of office as a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia.
